pbi:mashup.document:
section Section1;
shared Buyer = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, Query="
  SELECT DISTINCT
   SYSDATE EXTRACT_DATE,
   POA.AGENT_ID,
   POA.AGENT_NAME,
   PPV1.PPV1_APPROVER,
   PPV2.PPV2_APPROVER,
   CASE
      WHEN
         NVL( LEAST( POA.END_DATE_ACTIVE, FU.END_DATE ), SYSDATE + 1 ) < SYSDATE 
      THEN
         'No' 
      ELSE
         'Yes' 
   END
   ACTIVE_FLAG, FU.END_DATE USER_END_DATE, 
   CASE
      WHEN
         (
            SELECT
               COUNT(AGENT_ID) 
            FROM
               PO.PO_HEADERS_ALL PHA,
               APPS.ORG_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITIONS OOD,
               PO.PO_DISTRIBUTIONS_ALL PDA
            WHERE
               OOD.OPERATING_UNIT = PHA.ORG_ID 
               AND PHA.AGENT_ID = POA.AGENT_ID
               AND PDA.PO_HEADER_ID = PHA.PO_HEADER_ID
               AND OOD.ORGANIZATION_CODE = '"&ORG&"' 
         )
          + (
         SELECT
            COUNT(AGENT_ID) 
         FROM
            PO.PO_RELEASES_ALL PRA , APPS.ORG_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITIONS OOD 
         WHERE
            OOD.OPERATING_UNIT = PRA.ORG_ID 
            AND PRA.AGENT_ID = POA.AGENT_ID 
            AND OOD.ORGANIZATION_CODE = '"&ORG&"' ) > 0 
         THEN
            'Yes' 
         ELSE
            'No' 
   END
   PO_BUYER, 
   (
      CASE
         WHEN
            (
               SELECT
                  COUNT(INVENTORY_ITEM_ID) 
               FROM
                  INV.MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B MSI,
                  INV.MTL_PARAMETERS MP 
               WHERE
                  MP.ORGANIZATION_ID = MSI.ORGANIZATION_ID 
                  AND MSI.BUYER_ID = POA.AGENT_ID 
                  AND MP.ORGANIZATION_CODE = '"&ORG&"' 
            )
            > 0 
         THEN
            'Yes' 
         ELSE
            'No' 
      END
   )
   DEFAULT_BUYER, 
   (
      SELECT
         HRL.LOCATION_CODE 
      FROM
         APPS.HR_LOCATIONS HRL,
         APPS.PER_ASSIGNMENTS_F PA 
      WHERE
         PA.LOCATION_ID = HRL.LOCATION_ID 
         AND SYSDATE BETWEEN PA.EFFECTIVE_START_DATE AND PA.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE 
         AND PA.PERSON_ID = POA.AGENT_ID 
         AND PA.ASSIGNMENT_ID = 
         (
            SELECT
               MAX(PA2.ASSIGNMENT_ID) 
            FROM
               APPS.PER_ASSIGNMENTS_F PA2 
            WHERE
               PA2.PERSON_ID = PA.PERSON_ID 
         )
         AND ROWNUM = 1 
   )
   BUYER_LOCATION,
   (
      SELECT
         SUP.FULL_NAME 
      FROM
         APPS.PER_PEOPLE_X SUP,
         APPS.PER_ASSIGNMENTS_F PA 
      WHERE
         SUP.PERSON_ID = PA.SUPERVISOR_ID 
         AND SYSDATE BETWEEN PA.EFFECTIVE_START_DATE AND PA.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE 
         AND PA.PERSON_ID = POA.AGENT_ID 
         AND PA.ASSIGNMENT_ID = 
         (
            SELECT
               MAX(PA2.ASSIGNMENT_ID) 
            FROM
               APPS.PER_ASSIGNMENTS_F PA2 
            WHERE
               PA2.PERSON_ID = PA.PERSON_ID 
         )
         AND ROWNUM = 1 
   )
   SUPERVISOR 
         FROM
            APPS.PO_AGENTS_V POA,
            (
               SELECT
                  TO_CHAR(PPX.PERSON_ID) AS PERSON_ID,
                  PPX.FULL_NAME AS PPV1_APPROVER 
               FROM
                  APPS.PER_PEOPLE_X PPX 
            )
            PPV1,
            (
               SELECT
                  TO_CHAR(PPX.PERSON_ID) AS PERSON_ID,
                  PPX.FULL_NAME AS PPV2_APPROVER 
               FROM
                  APPS.PER_PEOPLE_X PPX 
            )
            PPV2,
            APPLSYS.FND_USER FU 
         WHERE
            1 = 1 
            AND POA.ATTRIBUTE2 = PPV1.PERSON_ID 
            AND POA.ATTRIBUTE3 = PPV2.PERSON_ID 
            AND FU.EMPLOYEE_ID = POA.AGENT_ID
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"AGENT_NAME", "Buyer Name"}, {"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"ACTIVE_FLAG", "Buyer Active Flag"}, {"PPV1_APPROVER", "PPV1 Approver"}, {"PPV2_APPROVER", "PPV2 Approver"}, {"DEFAULT_BUYER", "Default Buyer Flag"}, {"BUYER_LOCATION", "Location"}, {"PO_BUYER", "PO Buyer Flag"}, {"SUPERVISOR", "Supervisor Name"}, {"USER_END_DATE", "User End Date"}}),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Renamed columns", each [Buyer Name] <> "Oracle, Production")
in
  #"Filtered rows";
shared Supplier_Contact = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, Query="
  SELECT distinct asu.vendor_name
,hpc.party_name Contact_Name
,hpr.primary_phone_country_code contact_country
,hpr.primary_phone_area_code contact_area
,hpr.primary_phone_number contact_phone
,hpr.email_address
,assa.vendor_site_code
,assa.vendor_site_id
,asco.vendor_contact_id
,asco.inactive_date
FROM
 apps.hz_relationships hr
,apps.ap_suppliers asu
,apps.ap_supplier_sites_all assa
,apps.ap_supplier_contacts asco
,apps.hz_org_contacts hoc
,apps.hz_parties hpc
,apps.hz_parties hpr
,apps.hz_contact_points hpcp
,apps.org_organization_definitions ood
WHERE hoc.party_relationship_id = hr.relationship_id
AND hr.subject_id = asu.party_id
AND hr.relationship_code = 'CONTACT'
AND hr.object_table_name = 'HZ_PARTIES'
AND asu.vendor_id = assa.vendor_id
AND hr.object_id = hpc.party_id
AND hr.party_id = hpr.party_id
AND asco.relationship_id  = hoc.party_relationship_id
AND assa.party_site_id = asco.org_party_site_id
AND hpr.party_type='PARTY_RELATIONSHIP'
AND hpr.party_id = hpcp.owner_table_id
AND hpcp.owner_table_name = 'HZ_PARTIES'
AND OOD.OPERATING_UNIT = ASSA.ORG_ID
and ood.organization_code = '"&ORG&"'

", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"CONTACT_NAME", "Contact Name"}, {"EMAIL_ADDRESS", "Email Address"}, {"INACTIVE_DATE", "Inactive Date"}, {"VENDOR_NAME", "Supplier Name"}, {"VENDOR_SITE_CODE", "Supplier Site Code"}, {"CONTACT_PHONE", "Contact Phone"}, {"CONTACT_AREA", "Contact Area"}, {"CONTACT_COUNTRY", "Contact Country"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared Supplier = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, 
  Query="
   SELECT
   SYSDATE EXTRACT_DATE,
   XXPOV.SEGMENT1 SUPPLIER_NUMBER,
   XXPOV.VENDOR_NAME,
   XXPOV.VENDOR_NAME_ALT,
   XXPOVS.VENDOR_SITE_ID,
   XXPOVS.VENDOR_ID,
   XXPOVS.VENDOR_SITE_CODE,
   XXPOVS.VENDOR_SITE_CODE_ALT,
   (
      CASE
         WHEN
            XXPOVS.VENDOR_SITE_CODE_ALT IS NOT NULL 
         THEN
            'Yes' 
         ELSE
            'No' 
      END
   )
   PRODUCTION_SUPPLIER_FLAG, XXPOVS.CREATION_DATE SUPPLIER_CREATION_DATE, XXPOVS.LAST_UPDATE_DATE SUPPLIER_LAST_UPDATE_DATE, XXPOVS.PAY_SITE_FLAG, XXPOVS.PURCHASING_SITE_FLAG, XXPOVS.CITY, XXPOVS.COUNTRY, XXPOVS.COUNTRY_OF_ORIGIN_CODE, 
   (
      CASE
         WHEN
            LEAST ( NVL( XXPOV.END_DATE_ACTIVE, SYSDATE + 1 ), NVL(XXPOVS.INACTIVE_DATE, SYSDATE + 1) ) < TRUNC(SYSDATE) 
         THEN
            'No' 
         ELSE
            'Yes' 
      END
   )
   ACTIVE_SUPPLIER_FLAG, 
   CASE
      WHEN
         NVL( XXPOV.END_DATE_ACTIVE, SYSDATE + 1) > NVL(XXPOVS.INACTIVE_DATE, SYSDATE + 1) 
      THEN
         XXPOVS.INACTIVE_DATE 
      ELSE
         XXPOV.END_DATE_ACTIVE 
   END
   INACTIVE_DATE, XXPOVS.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE, XXPOVS.PAYMENT_CURRENCY_CODE, XXPOVS.PAYMENT_METHOD_LOOKUP_CODE, XXPOV.VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE, DECODE( XXPOV.ATTRIBUTE1, 'Y', 'Yes', 'No') INTERNAL_SUPPLIER_FLAG, DECODE( XXPOV.ATTRIBUTE4, 'Y', 'Yes', 'No') ISUPPLIER_FORECAST_FLAG, XXPOVS.FOB_LOOKUP_CODE, XXPOVS.FREIGHT_TERMS_LOOKUP_CODE, 
   (
      CASE
         WHEN
            (
               SELECT
                  COUNT(1) 
               FROM
                  APPS.HZ_RELATIONSHIPS HR1,
                  APPS.HZ_PARTIES HP1,
                  APPS.FND_USER FU 
               WHERE
                  1 = 1 
                  AND HR1.OBJECT_TABLE_NAME = 'HZ_PARTIES' 
                  AND HR1.OBJECT_TYPE = 'ORGANIZATION' 
                  AND HP1.PARTY_ID = HR1.OBJECT_ID 
                  AND FU.PERSON_PARTY_ID = HR1.SUBJECT_ID 
                  AND XXPOV.PARTY_ID = HP1.PARTY_ID 
                  AND NVL(FU.END_DATE, SYSDATE + 1) > SYSDATE 
            )
            > 0 
         THEN
            'Yes' 
         ELSE
            'No' 
      END
   )
   ISUPPLIER_FLAG, APT.NAME PAYMENT_TERM, 
   CASE
      WHEN
         NVL( ( 
         SELECT
            MIN(POA.CREATION_DATE) 
         FROM
            APPS.PO_ACCEPTANCES_V POA, PO.PO_HEADERS_ALL PHA 
         WHERE
            PHA.VENDOR_ID = XXPOV.VENDOR_ID 
            AND PHA.VENDOR_ID = XXPOV.VENDOR_ID 
            AND POA.PO_HEADER_ID = PHA.PO_HEADER_ID 
            AND PHA.VENDOR_SITE_ID = XXPOVS.VENDOR_SITE_ID 
            AND POA.ACCEPTING_PARTY = 'S' ), SYSDATE ) > NVL( ( 
            SELECT
               MIN(POA.CREATION_DATE) 
            FROM
               APPS.PO_ACCEPTANCES_V POA, PO.PO_RELEASES_ALL PRA, PO.PO_HEADERS_ALL PHA 
            WHERE
               PHA.VENDOR_ID = XXPOV.VENDOR_ID 
               AND PHA.VENDOR_ID = XXPOV.VENDOR_ID 
               AND POA.PO_RELEASE_ID = PRA.PO_RELEASE_ID 
               AND PHA.VENDOR_SITE_ID = XXPOVS.VENDOR_SITE_ID 
               AND POA.ACCEPTING_PARTY = 'S' 
               AND PHA.PO_HEADER_ID = PRA.PO_HEADER_ID ), SYSDATE ) 
            THEN
( 
               SELECT
                  MIN(POA.CREATION_DATE) 
               FROM
                  APPS.PO_ACCEPTANCES_V POA, PO.PO_RELEASES_ALL PRA, PO.PO_HEADERS_ALL PHA 
               WHERE
                  PHA.VENDOR_ID = XXPOV.VENDOR_ID 
                  AND PHA.VENDOR_ID = XXPOV.VENDOR_ID 
                  AND POA.PO_RELEASE_ID = PRA.PO_RELEASE_ID 
                  AND PHA.VENDOR_SITE_ID = XXPOVS.VENDOR_SITE_ID 
                  AND POA.ACCEPTING_PARTY = 'S' 
                  AND PHA.PO_HEADER_ID = PRA.PO_HEADER_ID ) 
               ELSE
( 
                  SELECT
                     MIN(POA.CREATION_DATE) 
                  FROM
                     APPS.PO_ACCEPTANCES_V POA, PO.PO_HEADERS_ALL PHA 
                  WHERE
                     PHA.VENDOR_ID = XXPOV.VENDOR_ID 
                     AND PHA.VENDOR_ID = XXPOV.VENDOR_ID 
                     AND POA.PO_HEADER_ID = PHA.PO_HEADER_ID 
                     AND PHA.VENDOR_SITE_ID = XXPOVS.VENDOR_SITE_ID 
                     AND POA.ACCEPTING_PARTY = 'S' ) 
   END
   FIRST_PO_ACCEPTANCE,
   CASE
      WHEN
         NVL( ( 
         SELECT
            MAX(POA.CREATION_DATE) 
         FROM
            APPS.PO_ACCEPTANCES_V POA, PO.PO_HEADERS_ALL PHA 
         WHERE
            PHA.VENDOR_ID = XXPOV.VENDOR_ID 
            AND PHA.VENDOR_ID = XXPOV.VENDOR_ID 
            AND POA.PO_HEADER_ID = PHA.PO_HEADER_ID 
            AND PHA.VENDOR_SITE_ID = XXPOVS.VENDOR_SITE_ID 
            AND POA.ACCEPTING_PARTY = 'S' ), SYSDATE ) > NVL( ( 
            SELECT
               MIN(POA.CREATION_DATE) 
            FROM
               APPS.PO_ACCEPTANCES_V POA, PO.PO_RELEASES_ALL PRA, PO.PO_HEADERS_ALL PHA 
            WHERE
               PHA.VENDOR_ID = XXPOV.VENDOR_ID 
               AND PHA.VENDOR_ID = XXPOV.VENDOR_ID 
               AND POA.PO_RELEASE_ID = PRA.PO_RELEASE_ID 
               AND PHA.VENDOR_SITE_ID = XXPOVS.VENDOR_SITE_ID 
               AND POA.ACCEPTING_PARTY = 'S' 
               AND PHA.PO_HEADER_ID = PRA.PO_HEADER_ID ), SYSDATE ) 
            THEN
( 
               SELECT
                  MAX(POA.CREATION_DATE) 
               FROM
                  APPS.PO_ACCEPTANCES_V POA, PO.PO_RELEASES_ALL PRA, PO.PO_HEADERS_ALL PHA 
               WHERE
                  PHA.VENDOR_ID = XXPOV.VENDOR_ID 
                  AND PHA.VENDOR_ID = XXPOV.VENDOR_ID 
                  AND POA.PO_RELEASE_ID = PRA.PO_RELEASE_ID 
                  AND PHA.VENDOR_SITE_ID = XXPOVS.VENDOR_SITE_ID 
                  AND POA.ACCEPTING_PARTY = 'S' 
                  AND PHA.PO_HEADER_ID = PRA.PO_HEADER_ID ) 
               ELSE
( 
                  SELECT
                     MAX(POA.CREATION_DATE) 
                  FROM
                     APPS.PO_ACCEPTANCES_V POA, PO.PO_HEADERS_ALL PHA 
                  WHERE
                     PHA.VENDOR_ID = XXPOV.VENDOR_ID 
                     AND PHA.VENDOR_ID = XXPOV.VENDOR_ID 
                     AND POA.PO_HEADER_ID = PHA.PO_HEADER_ID 
                     AND PHA.VENDOR_SITE_ID = XXPOVS.VENDOR_SITE_ID 
                     AND POA.ACCEPTING_PARTY = 'S' ) 
   END
   LAST_PO_ACCEPTANCE,
   (
      SELECT
         MAX(API.INVOICE_DATE) 
      FROM
         APPS.AP_INVOICES_ALL API 
      WHERE
         API.ORG_ID = XXPOVS.ORG_ID 
         AND API.VENDOR_SITE_ID = XXPOVS.VENDOR_SITE_ID 
   )
   LAST_INVOICE_DATE,
   (
      SELECT
         COUNT(1) 
      FROM
         APPS.HZ_RELATIONSHIPS HR1,
         APPS.HZ_PARTIES HP1,
         APPS.FND_USER FU 
      WHERE
         1 = 1 
         AND HR1.OBJECT_TABLE_NAME = 'HZ_PARTIES' 
         AND HR1.OBJECT_TYPE = 'ORGANIZATION' 
         AND HP1.PARTY_ID = HR1.OBJECT_ID 
         AND FU.PERSON_PARTY_ID = HR1.SUBJECT_ID 
         AND XXPOV.PARTY_ID = HP1.PARTY_ID 
         AND NVL(FU.END_DATE, SYSDATE + 1) > SYSDATE 
   )
   ISUPPLIER_USER_COUNT,
   (
      SELECT
         P.FULL_NAME 
      FROM
         APPS.PER_ALL_PEOPLE_F P 
      WHERE
         P.CURRENT_EMPLOYEE_FLAG = 'Y' 
         AND TRUNC (SYSDATE) BETWEEN P.EFFECTIVE_START_DATE AND P.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE 
         AND TO_CHAR(P.PERSON_ID) = XXPOV.ATTRIBUTE2 
   )
   SUPPLIER_LEAD,
   XXPOV.ATTRIBUTE5 SUPPLIER_CLASS,
   NVL(XXVD.VENDOR_CATEGORY, 'Unassigned') SUPPLIER_CATEGORY,
   NVL(XXVD.SSM_LEAD, 'Unassigned') SSM_LEAD,
   NVL(XXVD.MASTER_VENDOR_NAME, XXPOV.VENDOR_NAME)MASTER_SUPPLIER,
   NVL(XXVD.ATTRIBUTE1, 'NA') KEY_AND_RISK_FLAG,
   DECODE(XXVD.ATTRIBUTE2, 'Y', 'Yes', 'No') KPI_FLAG 
                  FROM
                     APPS.PO_VENDORS XXPOV,
                     APPS.PO_VENDOR_SITES_ALL XXPOVS,
                     APPS.ORG_ORGANIZATION_DEFINITIONS OOD,
                     APPS.HR_OPERATING_UNITS HOU,
                     APPS.AP_TERMS_V APT,
                     XXDIMS.XX_VENDOR_DIM XXVD 
                  WHERE
                     1 = 1 
                     AND XXPOV.EMPLOYEE_ID IS NULL 
                     AND XXPOV.VENDOR_ID = XXPOVS.VENDOR_ID 
                     AND XXPOVS.ORG_ID = OOD.OPERATING_UNIT 
                     AND HOU.ORGANIZATION_ID = OOD.OPERATING_UNIT 
                     AND XXPOVS.TERMS_ID = APT.TERM_ID ( + ) 
                     AND XXPOV.VENDOR_ID = XXVD.VENDOR_ID ( + ) 
                     AND OOD.ORGANIZATION_CODE = '"&ORG&"'
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"SUPPLIER_CREATION_DATE", "Supplier Creation Date"}, {"SUPPLIER_LAST_UPDATE_DATE", "Supplier Last Update Date"}, {"SUPPLIER_NUMBER", "Supplier Number"}, {"VENDOR_NAME", "Supplier Name"}, {"VENDOR_NAME_ALT", "Supplier Name Alternate"}, {"VENDOR_SITE_CODE", "Supplier Site Code"}, {"VENDOR_SITE_CODE_ALT", "Supplier Site Code Alternate"}, {"PRODUCTION_SUPPLIER_FLAG", "Production Supplier Flag"}, {"PAY_SITE_FLAG", "Pay Site Flag"}, {"PURCHASING_SITE_FLAG", "Purchasing Site Flag"}, {"CITY", "City"}, {"COUNTRY", "Country"}, {"COUNTRY_OF_ORIGIN_CODE", "Country of Origin"}, {"ACTIVE_SUPPLIER_FLAG", "Active Supplier Flag"}, {"INACTIVE_DATE", "Inactive Date"}, {"INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE", "Invoice Currency"}, {"PAYMENT_CURRENCY_CODE", "Payment Currency"}, {"PAYMENT_METHOD_LOOKUP_CODE", "Payment Method"}, {"VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE", "Supplier Type"}, {"ISUPPLIER_FORECAST_FLAG", "ISupplier Forecast Flag"}, {"FOB_LOOKUP_CODE", "FOB"}, {"FREIGHT_TERMS_LOOKUP_CODE", "Freight Term"}, {"PAYMENT_TERM", "Payment Term"}, {"ISUPPLIER_FLAG", "ISupplier Flag"}, {"FIRST_PO_ACCEPTANCE", "ISupplier First Acceptance"}, {"LAST_PO_ACCEPTANCE", "ISupplier Last Acceptance"}, {"INTERNAL_SUPPLIER_FLAG", "Internal Supplier Flag"}, {"LAST_INVOICE_DATE", "Last Invoice Date"}, {"ISUPPLIER_USER_COUNT", "ISupplier User Count"}, {"SUPPLIER_LEAD", "Supplier Lead"}, {"SUPPLIER_CLASS", "Supplier Class"}, {"SSM_LEAD", "SSM Lead"}, {"SUPPLIER_CATEGORY", "Supplier Category"}, {"MASTER_SUPPLIER", "Master Supplier"}, {"KEY_AND_RISK_FLAG", "Key and Risk Flag"}, {"KPI_FLAG", "KPI Required Flag"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared ORG = let
  ORG = "LDP" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type text]
in
  ORG;
